channel.title: SD card and sensel morph
channel.description:
I imagine what I'm trying to do is quite simple, though I cant do it so...
Im trying to get two patches loaded onto my recently formatted but never before used sd card, which I intend to programm a midi CC patch change to switch between the two patches so I can play the axoloti patches with my sensel morph, without having to use a computer.
The current issue Im having is that if I set patch to upload to sdcard at startup, or have the sd card inserted at all, it disables the morph - if I restart without the card in I can access a patch in flash but with the card inserted Im getting neither morph or patch loaded. What am I missing?

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @tIB Andrew Williamson
item.description:
@tIB wrote:

Slight error in post above: removing 'objects' from the file path worked for my friend.

It isnt working for me though - can't seem to get loading controller objects working at all, despite apparantly pointing it in the right place i get:

Using controller object: controllers\changepatch
Unable to created controller for : controllers\changepatch

Read full topic

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @tIB Andrew Williamson
item.description:
@tIB wrote:

Update time...

I used keyman's patch in both versions of the MPE patches - I have patch loading from sd, buttons switching between two patches and he morph playing nicely, hurrah!

Today's job is to add in a preset select patch a friend passed on, and then get the patch select into a controller object - currently its not loading the file path though I've been given a clue as to why (file extension apparantly - its not recognising the ones given here as it should do, but seems it might if I remove the users\andy\axoloti part).

Ultimately though I'm where I wanted to be and now I'm trying to get set up a little better so I can take things further... Thanks for all the help folks!

Read full topic

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @tele_player
item.description:
@tele_player wrote:

Yes, your software and firmware are the best stable versions.
Here's what I see on startup:
Axoloti version : 1.0.12-2-0-g7975cc87 build time : 09/04/2018 13:15:31 GMT
Link to firmware CRC E95BAC96
Status: factory (1.0.12,anon) : OK ( 1.0.12,clean )
Status : home : OK
Status: community (1.0.12,anon) : OK ( 1.0.12,clean )
USB device found
connected
Authentic Axoloti Core
search path : /Users/me/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-factory/objects
Firmware version: 1.0.0.1, crc=0xE95BAC96, entrypoint=0x20011000
search path : /Users/me/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-local/objects
search path : /Users/me/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-contrib/objects
finished loading objects

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

this is my patch = patchchangeall.axs
allows MIDI program change and use of the two tiny buttons on Axoloti itself
this file/patch "reside" similar to your C:\Users\Andy\Documents\axoloti\objects\

correction: dir should be: C:\Users\Andy\Documents\axoloti\objects\controllers

Screenshot 2020-07-30 at 14.05.23.png1230x714 60.7 KB

Read full topic

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

tIB:

blank patch

??? why this?
The so called "controller object" is just a patch with the patch change mechanism...(and its directory) if this makes sense to you.

Read full topic

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @tIB Andrew Williamson
item.description:
@tIB wrote:

Thanks that's helpful - I think the problem I have is that can't seem to get a controller object to run on a blank patch. I've added a directory:
local controllers C:\Users\Andy\Documents\axoloti\objects\
checked the enable controllers and saved a test file that runs when I make it live in normal use, but nothing.

I've got a friend on the case so hopefully he cracks it...

Read full topic

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

sorry had to leave..
yeah, all good, Im on the same firmware/Axoloti Patcher (editor)

tIB:

but am yet to figure out controller objects.

ohh plenty of posts/info around...
This might help?

Patch Bank and Midi Program change Your Music/Projects
Just a proof of concept working :wink: SoftStep sending MIDI program change to Axoloti 1.0.7 Patch Bank this to Controller object, create a Patch Bank, add patches to it and upload to SD card that's it !! [image] oldies...iPad 1 - S1MIDI Trigger - Line6 Mobilizer sending MIDI program change and notes

Read full topic

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @tIB Andrew Williamson
item.description:
@tIB wrote:

At this point I'm not sure I have the right firmware in my axoloti core? It's showing as:
Authentic Axoloti Core
Firmware version: 1.0.0.1
Software wise I'm: Axoloti version : 1.0.12-2-0-g7975cc87 build time : 29/11/2018 14:38:54 CET
I'm perhaps wrongly assuming the versions should match?

Meanwhile I can change patches and presets, but am yet to figure out controller objects. I've things to try but I'm partway down a frustrating rabbit hole... it's quite the hackaround. I assumed it was my rubbish computer skills but am reassured by someone who has the skills that for the most part it's not elegant.

Read full topic

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

tIB:

Updating now

you don't have to

tIB:

nothing seems particularly easy in axoloti

takes some getting used to; but this forum and users can help.
This post is getting long but maybe it's just a case of some planning ahead:
* patch change
* what "produces" the change
* if using USB MIDI - patches have to address this

Just a few ideas from top of my head...

Read full topic

Steps forward...

I've got it loading a patch and keeping the morph connected - I can now load a patch in flash and change it by enterring the card. Next step is patch changng, which I've begun but so far failed - as a start point Im trying to use the buttons on the axo to switch patches... more trying/searching later...

item.title: SD card and sensel morph
item.dc:creator: @tIB Andrew Williamson
item.description:
@tIB wrote:

Yes, I've searched and found thanks, though the issue I have before I can get to that is that loading from the SD card knocks off connection to the morph.

Edit: And by that I means Inc an SD card in the axo on boot disconnects the morph.
